2. In a multistage impulse generator, for producing very high voltages, a bank of capacitors is

answers.a: Charged in parallel and then discharged in series
answers.b: Charged in series and then discharged in parallel
answers.c: Charged in parallel and then discharged in parallel only
answers.d: Charged in series and then discharged in series only
